pullrequest.title: Explicit call to ruby to fix the run of xmlschema on windows

content.raw:
I had disabled the [sdformat-any-devel-windows7](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-windows7-amd64/) job, so I just re-enabled it. It was out of disk space, so I deleted what looked like a tmp folder in a haptix-comm sdk builder; hope it wasn't important. We should make sure to delete any temporary files when these jobs are finished.

Started a new job for this branch:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-windows7-amd64/66/
content.html:
